verses.verse: As the deer <S%H354><s%> pants <S%H6165><s%> for the water <S%H4325><s%> brooks, <S%H650><s%> so my soul <S%H5315><s%> pants <S%H6165><s%> after you, <S%H430><s%> God.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsts <S%H6770><s%> for God, <S%H430><s%> for the living <S%H2416><s%> God. <S%H410><s%> When shall I come <S%H935><s%> and appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God? <S%H430><s%>
My tears <S%H1832><s%> have been my food <S%H3899><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> while they continually <S%H3117><s%> ask <S%H559><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> "Where is your God?"

These things I remember, <S%H2142><s%> and pour out <S%H8210><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> within me, <S%H5674><s%> how I used to go with the crowd, <S%H5519><s%> and led <S%H1718><s%> them to the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of joy <S%H7440><s%> and praise, <S%H8426><s%> a multitude <S%H1995><s%> keeping a holy day. <S%H2287><s%>

Why are you in despair, <S%H7817><s%> my soul? <S%H5315><s%> Why are you disturbed <S%H1993><s%> within me? <S%H3176><s%> Hope in God! <S%H430><s%> For I shall still praise <S%H3034><s%> him for the saving help <S%H3444><s%> of his presence. <S%H6440><s%>

My God, <S%H430><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> is in despair <S%H7817><s%> within me. <S%H2142><s%> Therefore I remember you from the land <S%H776><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> the heights of Hermon, <S%H2769><s%> from the hill <S%H2022><s%> Mizar. <S%H4706><s%>

Deep <S%H8415><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> to deep <S%H8415><s%> at the noise <S%H6963><s%> of your waterfalls. <S%H6794><s%> All your waves <S%H4867><s%> and your billows <S%H1530><s%> have swept over me. <S%H5674><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> in the daytime. <S%H3119><s%> In the night <S%H3915><s%> his song <S%H7892><s%> shall be with me: <S%H8605><s%> a prayer to the God <S%H410><s%> of my life. <S%H2416><s%>

I will ask <S%H559><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> my rock, <S%H5553><s%> "Why have you forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me? <S%H3212><s%> Why do I go mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy? <S%H341><s%>"

As with a sword <S%H7524><s%> in my bones, <S%H6106><s%> my adversaries <S%H6887><s%> reproach <S%H2778><s%> me, <S%H3117><s%> while they continually ask <S%H559><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> "Where is your God?"

Why are you in despair, <S%H7817><s%> my soul? <S%H5315><s%> Why are you disturbed <S%H1993><s%> within me? <S%H3176><s%> Hope in God! <S%H430><s%> For I shall still praise <S%H3034><s%> him, <S%H3444><s%> the saving help of my countenance, <S%H6440><s%> and my God. <S%H430><s%>
